titleStmt.title: The Oppugnation, and fierce siege of Ostend by the Archduke Albertus his forces, commanded by the Duke of Ossuna who came before the saide towne, the fift day of Iune last past (after their writing) shewing what hath hapned since the time of the saide siege / diligently translated out of Dutch into English ...

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by V.S. for Thomas Pauier, and are to be sold at his shop in Cornehill, at the signe of the catte and two parrots,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Cornehill, at the signe of the catte
